item.title: Propriety
item.description: To save the author some work, dear reader, imagine the 3 Spiderman meme. Fill in “Who owns client data validation?” as the title and label the Spidermans (Spidermen?) Controller/Service/Persistence. One place has to own that responsibility. Let’s say we had a bug where we accidentally allowed Widgets with an empty price field. How do you fix that? Where do you fix that? Knowing who owns a responsibility in your application is essential.
